thread.section_title: The Connaught - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best stay
thread.title_full: Best stay - Review of The Connaught, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Bumerino
title: Best stay
text:
I took my wife on our first vacation abroad with our kids, and I wanted it to be perfect; staying at The Connaught actually enhanced our vacation experience.
Every staff member with whom we came in contact was attentive and kind including Luis Front Office Manager, Avi Duty Manager and Bhau for Butler Team.
We have already decided to return to the Connaught for our next vacation in the near future.
We had a wonderful stay vacation, and I have recommended The Connaught to all of my colleagues, friends and family. Thank you again for such outstanding service.
